messages.content: Rank candidates for a Backend / Tech Lead role with focus on leadership and years of experience.

{"question": "Which candidate is better prepared for a Backend Tech Lead position?", "filters": {"prepared": true, "english_level_min": "B2"}, "context": [{"candidate_id": "MauroGiobertiBackendDotNetEnglishC1TechLead", "section": "GeneralInfo", "offset": 0, "text": "12 years of software engineering, 10 relevant, Tech Lead and mentoring roles, English C1, Spanish Native."}, {"candidate_id": "JeronimoGarciaFrontendReactEnglishB2", "section": "Experience", "offset": 100, "text": "Frontend developer with React/Next.js, 3 years experience, English B2, migration AngularJSâ†’Next.js."}]}

{"ranked_candidates": [{"candidate_id": "MauroGiobertiBackendDotNetEnglishC1TechLead", "reason": "12 years of backend/software engineering, Tech Lead experience, strong English (C1).", "citations": [{"section": "GeneralInfo", "offset": 0}]}, {"candidate_id": "JeronimoGarciaFrontendReactEnglishB2", "reason": "Solid React/Next.js skills but less backend/leadership experience.", "citations": [{"section": "Experience", "offset": 100}]}], "notes": "Mauro is stronger for Backend/Tech Lead; Jeronimo is more frontend-oriented.", "grounded": true}
Filter candidates by English proficiency, return only those with C1 or higher.

{"question": "Who has the strongest English level?", "filters": {"english_level_min": "C1"}, "context": [{"candidate_id": "MauroGiobertiBackendDotNetEnglishC1TechLead", "section": "Languages", "offset": 0, "text": "English Advanced (CEF C1), Spanish Native."}, {"candidate_id": "JeronimoGarciaFrontendReactEnglishB2", "section": "Languages", "offset": 0, "text": "English: B2, daily standups in English."}]}

{"ranked_candidates": [{"candidate_id": "MauroGiobertiBackendDotNetEnglishC1TechLead", "reason": "Confirmed English C1.", "citations": [{"section": "Languages", "offset": 0}]}], "notes": "Jeronimo has B2, below C1.", "grounded": true}
Verify leadership experience with evidence such as Tech Lead roles or mentoring activities.

{"question": "Which candidate has verifiable leadership or mentoring experience?", "filters": {"prepared": true}, "context": [{"candidate_id": "MauroGiobertiBackendDotNetEnglishC1TechLead", "section": "SkillMatrix", "offset": 10, "text": "Technical Leadership: Very High; Mentoring: Very High; Explicitly stated in title and description."}, {"candidate_id": "JeronimoGarciaFrontendReactEnglishB2", "section": "Summary", "offset": 0, "text": "Frontend React/Next.js developer; no mention of mentoring or leadership."}]}

{"verified_candidates": [{"candidate_id": "MauroGiobertiBackendDotNetEnglishC1TechLead", "evidence": ["Tech Lead in title", "Mentoring roles mentioned"], "citations": [{"section": "SkillMatrix", "offset": 10}]}], "notes": "No leadership evidence for Jeronimo.", "grounded": true}
Rank .NET candidates by microservices and Azure experience.

{"question": "Top candidates for .NET microservices on Azure?", "filters": {"prepared": true}, "context": [{"candidate_id": "LuciaPerezBackendDotNetAzure", "section": "Experience", "offset": 50, "text": ".NET Core, microservices, Azure Functions, 8 years."}, {"candidate_id": "CarlosLopezDataSciencePython", "section": "Experience", "offset": 20, "text": "Python, TensorFlow, NLP, APIs in Flask."}]}

{"ranked_candidates": [{"candidate_id": "LuciaPerezBackendDotNetAzure", "reason": "Strong .NET microservices with Azure Functions.", "citations": [{"section": "Experience", "offset": 50}]}, {"candidate_id": "CarlosLopezDataSciencePython", "reason": "Relevant engineering skills but not .NET/Azure-focused.", "citations": [{"section": "Experience", "offset": 20}]}], "notes": "Lucia clearly matches .NET+Azure microservices.", "grounded": true}
Filter candidates with EF Core + SQL Server experience.

{"question": "Who covers EF Core + SQL Server well?", "filters": {"prepared": true}, "context": [{"candidate_id": "SofiaMartinezDotNetEFCoreSQL", "section": "Experience", "offset": 30, "text": "6 years EF Core, SQL Server tuning, Dapper."}, {"candidate_id": "MarianoVegaPythonDjangoPostgres", "section": "Experience", "offset": 30, "text": "7 years Django ORM, PostgreSQL, Celery."}]}
